title: A look back at the 20-year NBA career of Flip Saunders
text: Minnesota Timberwolves Flip Saunders Dead at 60 00:47 Flip Saunders, the Minnesota Timberwolves coach who racked up over 1,200 victories over the course of his 16-season head coaching career, passed away Sunday following a two-month battle with Hodgkin lymphoma. He was 60. At the time of his death, Saunders served as the Timberwolves' head coach and... Recent related news Back in August, Saunders announced that he had been diagnosed with "very treatable and curable" Hodgkin lymphoma, but planned to continue as the Timberwolves'...
